main event: Three metallic, circular, white objects were observed flying in a line for about 30 minutes in S Lakewood, New Jersey.
interesting points: The objects accelerated to full speed in 7 to 10 seconds,The objects emitted a brilliant white light,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes,The objects were observed 3 miles from Lakehurst,The manner of disappearance of the objects was not reported.
witness description: Mr. George Hitt reported the sighting to NAS Lakehurst.
